sections.text: A traveling menagerie arrives with creatures that only appear at midnight.

options.description: Sneak in after dark to see the creatures.
Volunteer to help the keeper during the day.

sections.text: At midnight the creatures sing. One small creature follows you home.

options.description: Keep the creature and care for it.

sections.text: Helping the keeper you learn the creatures' needs and earn a small reward.
The creature becomes your companion and leads you to small, joyful adventures.
You return the creature. The keeper thanks you and offers a ticket to the next show.
